title: Some of the things I know

sections.title: I am fluent in 3 programming languages
I can design and implement web apps with 2 web framworks
I can create micro-services and backend servers with 3 server-side framworks
I can automate workflows (CI/CD) and promote Agile processes with 2 tools
A few other things I know
sections.description: MongoDB, Firebase, Azure, TDD (Test-driven development), Scrum and Kanban Boards, UI/UX Design, and Flutter
